author: Shan
text: I want ASM 3 with Venom but i think Hardy wants to get in the MCU not the Sony Verse and it'll take a lot of convincing , but dude's a good guy, let's see . Maybe they already have a plan otherwise why would they point out that Andrew never fought an alien #SpiderManNoWayHome
